tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE borrower_info (
  borrower_id INT,
  name VARCHAR,
  address VARCHAR,
  phone_number VARCHAR,
  PRIMARY KEY (borrower_id)
);

CREATE TABLE loan_details (
    loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    borrower_id INT,
    loan_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    loan_approval_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (borrower_id) REFERENCES borrower_personal_information(id)
);

CREATE TABLE loans (
    loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    borrower_id INT REFERENCES borrowers(borrower_id),
    loan_amount DECIMAL,
    loan_type STRING,
    issue_date DATE,
    due_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE kyc_details (
    kyc_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    borrower_id INT REFERENCES borrowers(borrower_id),
    document_type STRING,
    document_number STRING,
    issue_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE BorrowerPersonalInformation (
    borrower_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(255),
    date_of_birth DATE,
    address VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE LoanDetails (
    loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    borrower_id INT REFERENCES BorrowerPersonalInformation(borrower_id),
    loan_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    loan_date DATE,
    interest_rate DECIMAL(5, 2),
    loan_duration INT
);

CREATE TABLE KYCCompliance (
    compliance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    borrower_id INT REFERENCES BorrowerPersonalInformation(borrower_id),
    kyc_document_type VARCHAR(50),
    kyc_document_number VARCHAR(50),
    kyc_expiry_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE LoanRepayment (
    repayment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    loan_id INT REFERENCES LoanDetails(loan_id),
    payment_date DATE,
    payment_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    payment_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE BorrowerPersonalInformation (
  borrower_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  full_name TEXT,
  date_of_birth DATE,
  address TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE BorrowerContactInformation (
  borrower_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  email TEXT,
  phone_number TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE LoanDetails (
  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  borrower_id INT,
  loan_amount DECIMAL,
  loan_status TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE KYCStatus (
  kyc_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  borrower_id INT,
  kyc_completed BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE KYCDocuments (
  document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  kyc_id INT,
  document_type TEXT,
  document_url TEXT
)
